scripts.check-ls: npm ls --loglevel=http --parseable 1>/dev/null && echo '# npm is in a good state'
scripts.cover: npm run test-cover -s && npm run check-cover -s
scripts.test: npm run check-ls -s && npm run lint -s && npm run cover
scripts.travis: npm run cover -s && istanbul report lcov && ((cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls) || exit 0)
